application.name: footprintmerge
application.brief: Find footprint islands, given a list of cubes
application.description: This program will take a list of cubes, merge the cube footprints and find those cubes that are islands.

history.change: Added handling of cubes crossing 0/360 boundary

parameter.name: FROMLIST
parameter.description: The list of cubes used to find footprint islands.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Text file used if MODE=Full. The filenames are listed for each footprint island.

parameter.name: MODE
parameter.brief: Amount of information written out about each footprint island.
parameter.description: Indicates whether detailed information about which images are contained in each footprint island are printed or simply how many footprint islands there are.

option.brief: Simply print how many footprint islands there are to the screen and log file
option.description: The number of footprint islands will be printed to the screen and log file.

option.brief: Print the number of cubes contained in each footprint island along with the filenames.
option.description: Print the number of cubes in each footprint island and the filesnames in each island to the screen and log file.
